content.query:
;WITH base_table AS
(
    SELECT * 
    FROM [default].[dbo].[flights_historical] 
    WHERE [route] IN (
        'EWR-CAI', 'FLL-LIS', 'JFK-ATH', 'JFK-CAI', 'LAX-ATH', 'LGA-CAI', 'LGW-IST', 'LGW-NRT', 'LHR-AMM',
        'LHR-DEL', 'LHR-HND', 'LHR-IST', 'LHR-LIM', 'LHR-NRT', 'LHR-SAW', 'MIA-LIS', 'STN-AMM', 'STN-SAW',
        'YTZ-ATH', 'YTZ-LIS', 'YYZ-ATH', 'YYZ-JNB', 'YYZ-LIS', 'JFK-JNB', 'YYZ-UIO', 'LAX-JNB', 'LHR-JNB',
        'LHR-SJO', 'SFO-LIS', 'YUL-LIS', 'LAX-LIM', 'YYZ-LIM', 'LAX-LIS', 'MIA-LIM', 'LAX-IST', 'LAX-UIO'
    ) 
    AND [cabin_class] = 'CAB_ECONOMY'
),
raw_data AS (
    SELECT
        CASE WHEN DATEPART(HOUR, [outbound_departure_datetime]) < 12 THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT) END AS outbound_am,
        CASE WHEN DATEPART(HOUR, [inbound_departure_datetime]) < 12 THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT) END AS inbound_am,
        CAST([outbound_departure_datetime] AS DATE) AS outboundDepartureDate,
        CAST([inbound_departure_datetime] AS DATE) AS inboundDepartureDate,
        CAST([search_date] AS DATE) AS searchDate,
        baggage_allowance,
        route,
        AVG([total_cost]) AS meanCost,
        MIN([total_cost]) AS minCost,
        MAX([total_cost]) AS maxCost,
        COUNT([total_cost]) AS countCost
    FROM base_table
    GROUP BY 
        route, 
        CAST([outbound_departure_datetime] AS DATE), 
        CAST([inbound_departure_datetime] AS DATE), 
        CASE WHEN DATEPART(HOUR, [outbound_departure_datetime]) < 12 THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT) END, 
        CASE WHEN DATEPART(HOUR, [inbound_departure_datetime]) < 12 THEN CAST(1 AS BIT) ELSE CAST(0 AS BIT) END, 
        CAST([search_date] AS DATE),
        baggage_allowance
),
filtered_data AS (
    SELECT 
        route, 
        outboundDepartureDate, 
        inboundDepartureDate, 
        outbound_am, 
        inbound_am, 
        baggage_allowance
    FROM raw_data
    GROUP BY 
        route, 
        outboundDepartureDate, 
        inboundDepartureDate, 
        outbound_am, 
        inbound_am, 
        baggage_allowance
)
SELECT a.*
FROM raw_data AS a
INNER JOIN filtered_data AS b
ON 
    a.route = b.route
    AND a.outboundDepartureDate = b.outboundDepartureDate
    AND a.inboundDepartureDate = b.inboundDepartureDate
    AND a.outbound_am = b.outbound_am
    AND a.inbound_am = b.inbound_am
    AND a.baggage_allowance = b.baggage_allowance;
